resources.string: This application will securely store all notifications you receive from the selected apps, allowing you to view them at your convenience.
To enable this feature, please grant permission to access notifications on this device.
Tap the button below to open a new screen displaying all apps requesting this permission. Kindly locate Notify Vault and enable it as demonstrated in the image below.
Manage notifications smarter: track, restore, and access your history anytime.
Catch them later with Notify. Stay organized and control which apps\' alerts you can store.
